text: I'm Marshall hman and I'm the CEO of
dtech systems so generative AI has
impacted The Insider risk management
industry in a couple of different ways
from the attackers perspective it's
really lowered the cost for
sophisticated social engineering attacks
against employees it's also allowed
employees to upload sensitive data into
publicly available llms such that a
malicious actor can extract that
information afterwards while giving
plausible deniability to the internal
employee from the defender perspective
generative AI has really helped take uh
lesser experience in lower skilled
analysts and help them have a mentor or
a coach at all times because they can
ask questions of a co-pilot and get
answers that they wouldn't otherwise
have the experience to you to answer so
the biggest misconception about
generative AI when it comes to Insider
risk management is that it's going to
replace human analysts in my experience
what it actually does it helps augment
the human analyst to help them do better
than they've been trained to do and to
have more experience than they
necessarily have thus freeing the more
experience analyst to work on the
problems that require real human
analysis so at detex we balance uh model
safety security and fast delivery in a
couple of different ways at first we
never leverage generative AI to quantify
risk that is something that we leverage
our machine learning models that have
been trained on behavioral analysis to
do second we don't train our models on
customer data and third uh we patented a
pseudo anonymization technique that
allows us to segregate data like pii and
customer sensitive data from what we
send to the models so we never have to
worry about unintentional hallucinations
or biases ads has already been
supporting detex in our gen Journey we
have been fortunate enough to work with
the AWS gen Innovation Center so we can
learn from their experts we can leverage
their best practices and we understand
what's coming in the road map one of the
things that we really like about aws's
Bedrock generative AI system is the
native built-in security that comes
along with it which is Paramount to an
organization like mine AWS helps DC be
more focused on customer outcomes and
less focused on the underlying
technology and infrastructure and for a
mission focused organization like detex
this is critical
we
